DOC.brief_summary: The study prospectively assesses the change in cancer-specific clinical decisions and outcomes before and after physicians received results from the Pathwork® Tissue of Origin (TOO) Test for patients whose primary site of cancer origin is uncertain.
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Study of Clinical Outcomes for the Pathwork Tissue of Origin Test
DOC.criteria: their physician ordered or intends to order a Pathwork® TOO Test between May 2012 and December 2013 the patient is ≥ 18 years of age the patient has given informed consent (online or verbal) the patient is able to understand English.
